title: 🚸 "To attain knowledge, add things everyday. To attain wisdom, remove things every day." - Lao Tzu
content:
Given a list of folders in a filesystem and the name of a folder to remove, return the new list of folders after removal.

Examples:

$ removeFolder(["/a","/a/b","/c/d","/c/d/e","/c/f", "/c/f/g"], 'c') $ ["/a","/a/b"] $ removeFolder(["/a","/a/b","/c/d","/c/d/e","/c/f", "/c/f/g"], 'd') $ ["/a","/a/b","/c","/c/f", "/c/f/g"]
